New.Headline: Customizable ScriptableObject icons
New.Body: Added the AssetIconAttribute to draw custom ScriptableObject icons.

New.Headline: Custom Error Messages
New.Body: Print log lines that open up to the location of the erroneous attribute.

New.Headline: Object Selector Support (2017.1 onwards)
New.Body: Added support for rendering icons in the Object Selector Window.
